tagline: Building intelligent solutions for real-world impact with modern web technologies and AI integration
bio: UNDP AI Hackathon Finalist and full-stack developer with expertise in IoT network management and agricultural technology. Creator of NetWatch Pro (enterprise network monitoring), AgroSense (AI-powered agriculture), and Reusability Compass (platform analytics). Specializing in React + Python integration, network automation, and scalable solutions that address real-world challenges.

experience.title: Sales & Marketing Executive
experience.description: Consistently exceeded sales targets through consultative selling, specialized in credit solutions and financial products, built strong client relationships.
